short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves the UI of the UCR Registration Page and adds direct links to both the Course Difficulty Database and Rate My Professors

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily access ratings and reviews from both Rate My Professors and the UCR Course Database within the official UCR registration page. This extension also vastly improves the design of the registration page, making it both more presentable and easier to read.

When searching for courses, two additional columns titled Course Difficulty and Rate My Professors will appear. The Course Difficulty column presents the average rating of the overall difficulty of the course as well as a link to the reviews in the database. The Rate My Professors column presents a link to that professor's rating on ratemyprofessors.com. Discussion and Lab sections will only display N/A since TA's aren't around long enough to gather reviews on RMP. 

Icon designed by Michelle Nguyen
Instagram: @_mai_han
